\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 98653}

\subsection*{Opiate Withdrawl and Anxiety Life Saver}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{curious}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 1800 mg & oral & Pharms - Gabapentin & daily\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 235.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
I was on percocet 10 for a year when my supply ran out. I went into withdrawal and my anxiety Came back. I was bed ridden and eating My klonopins with no relief. 



I went to my moms House to see what she had and all she had was 4 bottles of samples of 100 mg Neurontin, 100 pills per bottle. She said it was a pain reliever so I took 6 pills and about an hour later I started getting a small buzz and my withdrawals were

gone. I felt normal and with no anxiety.



I am 4 days into this with no percocets and I still feel great. I'm taking 6 neurontin 3 times a day. No buzz after last day but I still feel great\ldots it is a life saver.

\end{document}
